featured.title: TypeSpec 1.0 RC: Design APIs Faster Today, Scale Easier Tomorrow
featured.description: Discover how TypeSpec 1.0 RC revolutionizes API development by letting you generate server code, client libraries, and documentation from a single, concise definition.

videos.title: TypeSpec First, Vibe Code Second
videos.description: In this demo, I introduce VibeSpec - a fun side project that demonstrates how to use TypeSpec as a foundation for more effective AI-assisted coding.

videos.title: TypeSpec 101
videos.description: First part in a series of tutorial videos on writing API specs using TypeSpec.

videos.title: Audio Alchemy - Translate and Transcribe with Azure OpenAI
videos.description: In this episode, Mario Guerra really gets into how to translate and transcribe audio using Azure Cognitive Services and Azure OpenAI.
